name: Wormhole Cafe
description:
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Get excited, once ignored sexy genres are here!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
We here at Sweet Cakes Games are passionate about bringing more interesting categories ignored by other sex game developers. We've poured all of our energy into creating a fantastic sex simulator with an exciting twist! Behold, our biggest & best yet! Wormhole Cafe!
Wormholes are magical portals that can transport anything between spaces. So what if you set up a cafe where customers take home their very own lewd wormholes? Then you could have sex with them anywhere and any time! Catch her at work or walking on the street. Have her move around the wormhole for different sex positions! All while you get a private area to view her and do the deed from the comfort of our luxurious rooms.
All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
4 Characters, 4 Personalities, 4 Scenes!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Yua is a caregiver who works as a nurse at a hospital. Ichika is a curious photographer who takes pictures around the city. Sara is a bit of a scaredy cat but who likes to cosplay in private. Yui is half animal spirit and loves to hang out outdoors and around the park. All 4 never know when you're going to activate their wormhole!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Story
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Wormholes revolutionized shipping allowing anyone to make anything and send it anywhere else in the world. With this a new sexy industry was born; Wormhole Cafe's! They've grown tremendously in popularity in the last few years and now you're ready to see what all the fuss is about. As you walk just down the street from where you live you come across a cute and heavenly establishment with the words "Wormhole Cafe"! The host welcomes you to her cafe and escorts you to a private and luxurious room. She hands you a menu which has food, drinks, and girls to choose from!
